Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On VA-145 East in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of Centralia Rd; Chester Rd; Rt. 717E/W (Chesterfield County); VA-144N/S; VA-145W, motorists can expect delays due to standing water.
Label: Weather Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 45 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On Rt. 647 East in the County of Fauquier, in the vicinity of Lakeside Ct; Rt. 1015E/W (Fauquier County), motorists can expect potential delays due to weather.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Advisory
